Interface IDataBase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataBaseService

    public interface IDataBase
    Interface IDataBase, used for communication with the database.
    Author:
    Matthias

      int setNewOutgoingDelivery(OutgoingDelivery outgoingDelivery)
      persists a new outgoing delivery with the given outgoing articles to the DB; checks if PUs of outgoing articles are allowed and the given articleIds exist in the DB; if outgoing delivery is not valid, an Exception is thrown and a DB rollback is performed
      int setOrganisation(Organisation organisation)

      updates the new article distribution in the DB
      int updateIncomingDelivery(IncomingDelivery incomingDelivery)
      updates an existing incomingDelivery in the DB checks if the delivery is booked and updates it accordingly checks are performed to ensure article consistency
      int updateOutgoingDelivery(OutgoingDelivery outgoingDelivery)
      updates an existing outgoingDelivery with the given outgoing articles in the DB; checks if PUs of outgoing articles are allowed and the given articleIds exist in the DB; if outgoing delivery is not valid, an Exception is thrown and a DB rollback is performed
